page.title: 01RELIGION
page.content: The Methodist Church is the only place of worship in the village.It was built in 1844,and is constructed of red brick with a slate roof.It has a seating capacity of 120,but at the present there are only four members.One service is held every Sunday from 2.30p.m. to 3.30p.m. The minister lives in a nearby small town and has pastoral care of several churches in the area.He preaches here once every month.The other services are taken by lay preachers. There is a lively Sunday School held every Sunday morning from 11a.m. until noon,and it is supervised by a local farmer's wife. The Anglicans here worship in nearby village churches.
